 FairDAPP â€“ Infinity is a system designed to explore human behavior

 smart contract codes and pre-defined rules.
  
 This system is for internal use only and all could be lost
 by sending anything to this contract address.
  
 -The contract has an activation switch to activate the system.
 -No one can change anything once the contract has been deployed.
  
 -Built in Antiwhale for initial stages for a fairer system.

The scientists will take anything below 0.0001 ETH sent to the contract.
Thank you for your donation.

Fallback function to handle ethereum that was send straight to the contract
Unfortunately we cannot use a referral address this way.
Standard buy function.

Withdraw function.
Withdraw 50 stages at once on current settings.
May require to request withdraw more than once to withdraw everything.

attributes.documentation:
@title SafeMath v0.1.9
@dev Math operations with safety checks that throw on error
attributes.name: SafeMath

attributes.documentation: @dev Adds two numbers, throws on overflow.
attributes.name: add

attributes.documentation: @dev Subtracts two numbers, throws on overflow (i.e. if subtrahend is greater than minuend).
attributes.name: sub

attributes.documentation: @dev Multiplies two numbers, throws on overflow.
attributes.name: mul

attributes.documentation: @dev Integer division of two numbers, truncating the quotient.
attributes.name: div

attributes.documentation: @dev gives square root of given x.
attributes.name: sqrt

attributes.documentation: @dev gives square. multiplies x by x
attributes.name: sq

attributes.documentation: @dev x to the power of y
attributes.name: pwr
